overview_of_class: This course will introduce students to modern dance with an emphasis on release techniques. Students will gain a fuller understanding of their bodies and improve their balance, flexibility, musicality, bodily awareness, efficiency, and coordination. Students will gain strength and range of movement while progressing their artistic development.
name: Modern l
title: SoC DANCE 150-0-20 Modern l
